events.message: I received my laptop yesterday, but the screen has a large scratch all across it when I opened the box.
The reported issue was identified as a product defect due to the presence of scratches on the received item.
The case was assigned to the technical support team to handle the reported defect on the laptop screen.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the scratch on your laptop screen. I will do my best to help you resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please send us clear photos of the scratch and the packaging so we can assess the damage more effectively?
I’ve attached several pictures showing the scratch on the screen and the box it came in, which looks intact but the damage is clearly visible.
Thanks for the photos. We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to have the laptop replaced as soon as possible because I need it for work urgently.
The replacement request has been forwarded to the dispatch team to prioritize the shipment of a new laptop.
Your replacement laptop has been shipped today with express delivery and you will receive tracking details shortly.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is in good condition.
I received the replacement laptop today and it arrived without any damage. Thank you for the quick support.
We are glad the replacement was satisfactory. Closing the case now, please contact us again if you need further assistance.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback on your recent support experience.
